tweet:
The @USChamber & @ShopFloorNAM are standing in the way of real action on #ClimateChange.  

It's time for them to put the American people before corporate profit and support a clean energy economy. #ManufacturedFacts

I'm joining @SenateDems to introduce a resolution to end the Trump Administration’s rule on junk insurance plans. These plans offer less coverage but cost families more. 

This is another attack on the 130 million Americans with preexisting conditions. 

We're fighting back. https://twitter.com/SenateDems/status/1156604552545783811 …

What does #ERRPA do?

-Bans discriminatory profiling at all levels of law enforcement.
-Promotes training & development of protocols to discourage profiling.
-Requires data collection and reporting to assess improvement and hold agencies accountable to change. 
#MoreThanAProfile

Ending racial & religious profiling is a critical step in reforming our criminal justice system. 

I'm reintroducing The End Racial and Religious Profiling Act to ban this discriminatory practice. 

I'm hosting a briefing on #ERRPA streaming live now:  https://www.facebook.com/senatorbencardin/ …
On this anniversary, we must pledge to continue to preserve these programs and fight against attempts to take away health care as a human right for all.

The #ACA helped strengthen these programs. The Medicaid expansion extended coverage to millions of Americans who were ineligible before. 

Today, the ACA is under attack and so is the care of the beneficiaries who rely on it.
Fifty-four years ago, #Medicare and #Medicaid established a new era of health care – one that helped close gaps in health disparities and improve health outcomes for our most vulnerable citizens.

.@POTUS, we know this is just a distraction from the great work that @RepCummings is doing on the Oversight Committee keeping your actions in check. 

We will continue to do all we can to support Baltimore while defending our democracy. We can do both and we must. https://twitter.com/SenatorCardin/status/1156329577779793931 …

I'm proud to support @SenateDems' #DemocracyForAll amendment. 

Reversing #CitizensUnited affirms what we know to be true: The power of our democracy belongs to the people - NOT corporations, NOT big money. pic.twitter.com/IwMqCNyREA

We have a legal and moral duty to make sure U.S. weapons aren't used to repress human rights or enact violence against innocent civilians. 

By voting to allow arms sales to #SaudiArabia continue, Republicans have voted against this duty and their responsibilities as lawmakers.

For 29 years, the #ADA has empowered people with disabilities by prohibiting discrimination and ensuring equal access too educational, economic, and social opportunities.

Our society is more free and inclusive today because of this landmark civil rights law. #ADA29

Children without access to basic hygiene.

Children who aren't being looked after by child welfare professionals.

Too many Americans are skipping out on life-saving medication because they don't know if they can afford it.

This bipartisan bill takes a step toward changing that.
 
Let's continue to work together to control costs and improve options for #Medicare and #Medicaid beneficiaries. https://twitter.com/SenFinance/status/1154430635190173704 …

Gun violence is one of the leading causes of death in our nation. There's no doubt that it is a public health emergency. 

Federal funding for research into this epidemic makes common sense and will save lives. We must fight to make these funds a priority. 

#FundGVPResearch

Our panelists today remind us what we know is true:

The #ERA is a basic but important principle.

It's not about a partisan agenda.

It's about equality.
 #ERANow pic.twitter.com/zTLAwryMz0

We are only one state away from the 38 needed to ratify this amendment. 

Senator @lisamurkowski and I have already introduced S.J.Res 6, a resolution to remove the #ERA deadline once and for all. 

We can get this done! https://twitter.com/ERACoalition/status/1154383209913835522 …

I am so proud to be joined by Senator @lisamurkowski and the @ERACoalition to host a briefing on ending the deadline to ratify the #ERA. 

Watch us and our fantastic panelists LIVE on Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/senatorbencardin/ …
#ERANow

"Our investigation found that the Russian government interfered in our election in sweeping and systematic fashion." - Robert Mueller. 

We know this for certain and we know that Russia will be back in 2020. We cant wait until then to #ProtectOurElections. #MuellerHearing.

We vowed never to forget the tragedy of 9/11. Today, the Senate voted to reaffirm our commitment to its heroes.

The permanent extension of the 9/11 Victim Compensation Fund is a long-overdue recognition of our gratitude for their sacrifice for our country & citizens
#Renew911VCF

The intelligence community confirmed it.

This grant is one of the largest projects ever funded by the @USDOT INFRA Grant program.

Did you know that @NASAGoddard in Greenbelt, MD helmed communications for the Apollo 11 mission? Today they're still advancing missions to space.

Talented scientists & engineers got us to the Moon and they continue to take us even farther. #Apollo50 https://bit.ly/2Yd2npn

Fifty years ago we accomplished the impossible! 

The #MoonLanding paved the way for groundbreaking missions to come and reignited the American spirit of ingenuity and exploration.
 #Apollo50 pic.twitter.com/W7YrVZdHhm

America has always been a nation to offer asylum to migrants seeking protection as they flee violence and persecution in their homeland. 

@POTUS's anti-immigrant agenda counters our nation's values. I saw that firsthand today during my trip to the border with @SenateDems pic.twitter.com/TdiqsX5AiB

I took these photos today at detention facilities in Texas. 

These aren't criminals, they aren't just headlines. Trump's zero tolerance policies are targeting real families and real children fleeing violence and searching for safety.

We must do better than this. pic.twitter.com/HjEjrKTv7g

I'm joining @SenateDems in Texas today to see the inhumane conditions for children and families in our border facilities.

We cannot ignore this humanitarian crisis.

Marylanders were proud to see her at the helm of @PPFA because it also is a champion for quality health care for women and families. My pride in Dr. Wen and support for PPFA remain strong. I know that whatever challenge Dr. Wen takes on next, she will be immensely successful.

Dr. Wen has & will continue to be a tireless advocate for health care as a human right. As a physician and public health leader, she understands what's at stake for women’s access to reproductive health care. I know that she will keep fighting for the health & well-being of all. https://twitter.com/DrLeanaWen/status/1151223618698907650 …

Congress must work to confirm that Trump’s push to use data from other federal depts to count citizens vs non-citizens will have no bearing on the official 2020 census data, that privacy laws are respected, and that any shared citizenship data isn't misused by the administration.

The goal of the census is to make sure everyone within our borders is counted, not push people further into the shadows, which is what the citizenship question would do. 

@POTUS knows it, so he continues to find ways to skirt the rule of law & intimidate immigrant communities.
